doc.after: Painting is a mode of expression and the forms are numerous Drawing composition or abstraction and other aesthetics may serve to manifest the expressive and conceptual intention of the practitioner Paintings can be naturalistic and representational as in a still life or landscape painting photographic abstract be loaded with narrative content symbolism emotion or be political in nature
